comments:
dataItem.setValueExpr( "row[\"PRODUCTNAME\"]" );
System.out.println( dataItem.getValueExpr( ) );
IAction action = dataItem.getAction( );
action.setLinkType( "bookmark-link" );
System.out.println( action.getLinkType( ) );
action.setTargetBookmark( "\"label-bookmark\"" );
System.out.println( action.getTargetBookmark( ) );

steps to reproduce:

   - debug the above code with Java Debug

expected behavior:

   - the scripting events are executed

actual behavior:

   - dataItem.getAction( ) returned null

Fixed. If no Action was set in the ui a null action was returned in getAction. Fixed by creating a new action if current action is null in the set methods.
